import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid } from '@material-ui/core'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; import cx from 'classnames'; import styles from './Cards.module.css'; const Cards = ({ data: { confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate } }) => { //console.log(confirmed); if (!confirmed) { return ('loadding...'); } console.log(lastUpdate); return (
Infected {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of active cases of COVID-19. Recovered {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of recoveries from COVID-19. Deaths {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of deaths caused by COVID-19.
) } export default Cards;
